name: Rubik's Cube Simulator (itsyoboichad)
description: That's it, it's a virtual rubiks cube. This was simply an experiment to see if I could create a virtual cube in memory. I accomplished this by utilizing a 3 dimensional array, each of length 3, and used simple algorithms to swap pieces to simulate the rotation of the cubes faces. After that I just rotated the graphical part of the cube to represent the change, and voila! A cube.
